paragraph.paragraph: Use the /libraries/store/reference/interface/DB_CHANGE_flatshort.htmlDB_CHANGE class to perform any operation on your database that does not require access to a result. You can for instance modify table row content, drop table rows, create and delete tables.
paragraph.note:
Note: Take a look at the
../50_data_object_coupling/index.xml#insert Data Storing capability if you want to insert table rows.
paragraph.paragraph: /libraries/store/reference/interface/DB_CHANGE_flatshort.htmlDB_CHANGE allows you to modify the database data using the SQL language:

list.item:
Prepare your SQL query and use modify:
modification: DB_CHANGE -- Modification tool. ... create modification.make modification.modify("Update CONTACTS set Firstname = ' John'")

Commit your changes with your session control:
session_control: DB_CONTROL -- Session control. ... session_control.commit
Tip: It is always better to check the database status for errors before committing changes.
